DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this observational study is to utilise the established record linkage data available in Tayside to investigate hospital admissions, exacerbations and mortality in COPD.
DOC.brief_title: What Influences Patient Outcome in Obstructive Airway Disease?
DOC.criteria: Data collected through TARDIS database History of asthma or malignancy. Less than 50 years of age
